version_description: Bug Fixing.

More Bug Fixing. Thank you very much for your support. If you love current version please take a moment to write a review on App store. 

Our team is working on New update. Stay tune :)
We have Fixed bug in Video Section while sharing. Thanks for All your support.
Bug Fixing & Stability Improvement.

1) We have Redesign Home Screen. 
2) Added Free Collage Section.
3) Improved Image background Blur Feature.
4) Overall Impreoved UI.  
5) Number of Bug Fixing & Performance Improvement. 

We love to know your Feedback & Suggestions. Just shake Your Device & Share Feedback.
Bug Fixing.

Must have Photo & Video Editing App Instazz with Big Update : 

• App Size is now Reduce by 40%. So we have moved Effects on Store. You can download All Effect from Store FREE (Yeah like in past everything is Free )

• We have added Effects ( Photo Filters) In Store. You can download Effects which you like from store & Many more new Effects are coming soon !! 

• Make over of Stickers screen, Easily select multiple stickers for photo at a time. You can pick frequently used stickers from recent list. 

• Improved Selfie Cam.

• iOS 10 Ready. 

• Fixed Following bugs 
- Crash at Multiple Places. 
- When you do inApp Purchase watermark from Video / Slideshow  will be removed.

Must have Photo & Video Editing App Instazz with Big Update : 

• App Size is now Reduce by 40%. So we have moved Effects on Store. You can download All Effect from Store FREE (Yeah like in past everything is Free )

• We have added Effects ( Photo Filters) In Store. You can download Effects which you like from store & Many more new Effects are coming soon !! 

• Make over of Stickers screen, Easily select multiple stickers for photo at a time. You can pick frequently used stickers from recent list. 

• Improved Selfie Cam.

• iOS 10 Ready. 

• Fixed Following bugs 
- Crash at Multiple Places. 
- When you do inApp Purchase watermark from Video / Slideshow  will be removed.

A must have Photo & Video Editing App with Big Update Again !! 

Introducing Layouts (You can see this Option in Collage ) :
- Combine multiple photos in single frame. 
- Choose from more than 300 Different collage layouts. 

Borders are online now. 
- You can download new borders from store. 

Fonts are online now. 
- You can download new fonts from store. 

Bug Fixing from previous version.

- Introducing Canvas 

Instazz is now for Multi platform. You can make edits for your Photo for Social media like Facebook, Twitter , Pinterest Etc.

 Canvas option can Allow you to choose Different size(Dimension) of your Photo. 

- Bug Fixing From Previous version.

New Features : 

- You can set speed of Video ( Slow Motion & Fast motion ) 
- You can add Stickers on Videos.

Enhancement : 

- Timing in Slideshow Section.  

Bug Fixing : 

- Fixed some bugs from Previous version.

Mankpr update for Video Editor 

- You can Merge multiple video & Create 1 video. 
- Now you can add Title Image & Finish image to your videos. 
- Improved video slide show quality. 

We are coming up with Bigger update. 

Stay tune & Happy new year

NEW FEATURES: 

- Added Color splash Effect in Photo Editor. 
- Added Drawing tool in Photo Editor. 

ENHANCEMENT : 

- Improved stickers selection & moving/ Zoom in - Zoom out 

- When you select the photo in Photo Editor it will process much faster. 

- Ratio added in Free collage Section.

Thank you so much for your support. Please share your love by writing reviews.

If you Love Instazz , Please take a moment to Write review on App Store.

Makeover to App Icon. 

We have removed Default Blur Background. Now App will Remember background you used in past Edit & That will come up to next Edit. 

Bug Fixing & Performance Improvement.

- White background is Back. 
- Less advertisment. 
- Fixed Some Crash. 

If you Really loving current version. Please take a moment to write Review.

- Selfie cam is Now Improved. Have a look. 
- Many Users Reported bug for All Photos not showing is Resolved now.
- Low Advertise. 

If you have any Feedback kindly mail us at helloinstazz@gmail.com
We fixed a critical bug for layout for iPhone5/5S users. We are really sorry about this critical issue.
Corregido algunos errores de la versión anterior.

- You can Set Filter Intensity when you Apply Filter on Photos. 
- Minor Bug Fixing.

Introducing Instazz 3.0 , A Great New Look of App. We Improved UI & UX in this version.

- We have redesign whole App. 
- Made User Interface clean & Useful. 
- Lot of new Stickers on Store. 
- Improved Video Editor, Selfie Cam & Slideshow. 
- Improved Quality of Photo & Video While Exporting. 

We love to know your feedback on New version. Please share you feedback on helloinstazz@gmail.com

Thanks for helping us to make INSTAZZ better & better day by day.

Thanks for helping us to make INSTAZZ better & better day by day.

- Instazz is Now Officially PICFY !! Now call us PICFY :) 
- Introducing Ready made Designs. You can Fit your amazing photos in our Ready made Designs. Have a try it ! 
- Photo Editor Brush : We Added Blur & Pixel Brush. So you can Blur out some Area on your photo. 

If you Really love PICFY , Please take a moment to write review on App store.

Enjoy Our Latest update where we have several new features & Bug Fixing.

•You can remove unnecessary Store Content (Downloaded ) from Settings->Store Management 
•In layouts you can Swap Photos from one Grids to Another by Long Press on Photo.
•Critical Bug Fixing & Improvement. 

Instazz is not PICFY !! When you upload Photo on Instagram Please use #PICFY to get features on our page @picfy.app
Bug Fixing & Performance Improvement.

- Introducing Photo Overlay (Photo Blending). You can get Different Overlay Effects by Select Photo in Photo Editor. 
- Bug Fixing & Performance Improvement.

We are Getting Better & Better Day by Day !! 

- You can Favorite Text to use Repeatedly.
- Duplicate Text. 
- Improvement in Text Editor. 
- Added Mirror Mode in Photo Editor
- Improved Store Screen & Share Screen Experience. 
- New Effects in Photo Editor. 

Over All we have Done Improvement to make user Experience  better. If you love current version of PICFY  Please Rate us on App Store.

PICFY is compatible to iPhone X. 
Added Mirror Mode in Photo Editor. 
Bug Fixing & Performance Improvement.

We have done overall bug fixing & performance improvemnet. 

Many thanks for PICFY Team.
Bug Fixing & Performance Improvement.

▪Now you can change Photo From The Edit Screen. So you don’t need to come back to the home screen for multiple Edits. ▪Bug Fixed in Video Editor.
▪Added Beauty Mode in Selfie Camera. 
▪Fixed bug of Restore Purchase. If you still get this issue, please contact support. 
▪General Bug Fixing & Performance Improvement.

- For PLUS User we have added Photo Retouch Option. 
- Now you can clip selected area from Photos & You can use that as a Stickers too !! 
- Added New Stickers Category. 
- General Bug Fixing & Performance Improvement.

- You can clip some parts from Photo & Use As a Stickers. (You can get custom clipped Stickers from Stickers->Custom Stickers )
- Added Few More Ratios Like 9:21,10:16,3:5,5:7 (You can use in Canvas & Crop)
- General Bug Fixing & Performance Improvement.

- Introducing New monthly & yearly subscriptions to enjoy some paid Filters,Stickers & Advertise Free Experience. 
- Happy Winter & Merry Xmas. Check it out new material on store for Xmas & New Year. 
- Now you can set size of Repeated background. 
- Bug Fixing & Performance Improvement.

We have a great update for few new tools & Enhancement in Existing features. 

- We have Improved Design section. 
- We added More category in Design Like Meme, Smoky Effect, Calendar etc. You can create meme in Designs. 
- 9 Cut: You can upload Big size photo to your Instagram account.
- Hashtag Manager: Get rid of copy-paste hashtags again & again. Now you can store set of Hashtag in our app. 
- Beauty: Beautify your photos with some great tools. 
- We have added Few More photo Effects. Have a try it. 
- Bug Fixing & Performance Improvement.

Thank you for using PICFY ! We are Exited to bring update with cool new Features. 

- All New Store Materials for Valentine day. 
- We Added Live Filters in Selfie Camera !! THIS IS BIG :) (For now its available for iPhone6s & Later Devices )
- We added Video Cropping Features. You can use from Video Editor.
- Improved Photo Adjust Tool.
- General Improvement & Bug Fixing. 

Please share your Feedback to Improve PICFY ! Our team working overnight !!

Recent Update Includes : 

- Instagram Grid Tool is Improved! We have added Few more layouts in that. Must check it and make your Instagram profile Creative with it. Check-in Tools-> Grids 
- Now you can add Animated Stickers in Video. Check Animated Emojis Category. 
- There was a bug in Video Section when you delete the track. That is Resolved now. 
- Fixed Draft overwriting issue reported by few users.
- Fixed Few glitches in Video Collage, Designs Sections.

Thank you for all your support. If you like our recent update please take a moment to write a review on App Store. Your feedback always keeps us running.

Thank you for using PICFY ! 

- Changed App icon. (Cool Enough ? )
- We Improved Selfie Cam. Added Few more Selfie Face Filters.
- Improved Store Experience. 
- General Bug Fixing & Performance Improvement. 

Please share your Feedback to Improve PICFY ! Our team working overnight !!

Thank you for all your feedback & Helping us make our app better day by day. 

- Save your photos & videos as a draft, So you can continue editing anytime. 
- We added manually handcrafted Music, Which you can use in the background in your videos.
- Minor Bug Fixing & Performance Improvement.

If you have any query/feedback please feel free to mail us at picfyhelp@gmail.com 

Cheers! 
PICFY Team

Long a waited feature for saving drafts is here. Now you can save your Photos editing anytime when you are middle of something. So your editing will not loose.

Saved Draft will show shown at top of photo picker screen.

- Video Editor & Slideshow have more Trending Music of your country. 
- Added More Colors in the Drawing tool. 
- Latest iPhone Compatibility.

Thanks for All your Feedback. Recent Update Includes : 

Ratios: We added a few more ratios like the Instagram story & iPhone x Wall Paper. 

Drawing Tool: We have improved drawing tool. Now you can reuse drawing in your Photo.

Meme: Now you can create a quick meme with App. You can find this option in Photo Editor. 

Focusing Effect: In Photo Editor focus Photo is improved. You can try in Photo Editor -> Adjust -> Focus 

Recent Design: Now you can easily access your recently used designs. You can check in design. 

Create your own Sticker: Now you can create own stickers with App. You can find at Photo Editor -> Stickers -> Tap “+” 

Overall we have improved some user interface.

Recent Update Includes : 

- Instagram Grid Tool is Improved! We have added Few more layouts in that. Must check it and make your Instagram profile Creative with it. Check-in Tools-> Grids 
- Now you can add Animated Stickers in Video. Check Animated Emojis Category. 
- There was a bug in Video Section when you delete the track. That is Resolved now. 
- Fixed Draft overwriting issue reported by few users.
- Fixed Few glitches in Video Collage, Designs Sections.

Thank you for all your support. If you like our recent update please take a moment to write a review on App Store. Your feedback always keeps us running.

Recent Update Includes : 

- Added New Tool Called " Scheduler " - Schedule your post for any social media. PICFY will remind you to publish that post on schedule time. 
- We have added video transition effects between two video clips. Please check in the video editing section. 
- We have added useful features to hide unnecessary options in Photo & Video Editing. You can find it from Photo Editor -> last Option at the bottom called  Settings 
- We have added a new category in designs. Have a look. 
- We have solved a few issues in video collage section. 
- In Video collage added video editing option like Crop, Filter & Trim. 
- In Photo editing improved Meme Section.

New Features
---------------
We added New Photo Filters Category. Please check on the store. 
Cut Video: You can cut any portion of the clip. 
Color Picker: Easy to use color picker with HEX Colors code support.
Color Palette Enhancements: Added a greater variety of Colors. 

Bug Fixes
---------------
Video Editing & Video Collage bugs resolved.

If you like Current update, Please rate us on Apple Store. If you have any issue with an update you can contact at picfyhelp@gmail.com

New Features
---------------
Background Eraser: We have Added New Tool called Background Eraser. You can Remove Background from your Portrait photo and change to the trendy background. 
Artistic Filters: We have Added new Filter category called Artistic Filters. 

Bug Fixes
---------------
Crashes in Video Editing Section Resolved. 

If you like Current update, Please rate us on Apple Store. If you have any issue with an update you can contact at picfyhelp@gmail.com .

New Features
---------------
We have added Story Template for Instagram. You can create a story directly from the home screen. 
You can Directly Use Free Web Photos from Photo Picker. 
---------------
Crashes in Video Editing Section Resolved.

We have made considerable changes in our design due to the inclusion of a new user experience expert in our team! Please let us know how you like it by providing us positive feedback or email us for any constructive changes that you wish to suggest. 

- We have improved the "Photo Editor" section user experience! We have categories all editing option into 4 Parts.
 
1) Look - You can apply effects, overlays & adjustments.
2) Resize - Here you can adjust your canvas like Ratio, Border, etc.
3) Add - You can add stickers, text, frame & meme to your photos. 
4) Tool - Here you will find all the useful tools for your photos. 

- Now you can download pro filters for testing purpose & Then you can buy it. 
- We have redesign templates section! Now it's very easy to browse all the templates.
- You can create an Instagram grid( 9 Grids,6 Grids & 3 Grids) directly from the share screen.
- Don't forget to check the new backgrounds category Rainbow, Summer & Crayon we have uploaded. 
- We added a new overlay category. 

We love to hear your feedback about this update. Please mail us at picfyhelp@gmail.com  & Our team will respond you asap for any feedback. Follow us at picfy.app for new features updates.

+ We are glad to introduce PICFY Coins! You can use PICFY Coins to redeem Filters, Stickers, Backgrounds & Overlays. There are a number of ways you can earn those coins, quite easily. 
+ Change the App icon.   
+ Resolved crash when selecting Music Track. 
+ We have also a new revamped UI for the store! You can get access to all the store materials. Take a look and provide us with feedback.

With this update, we have made significant changes. 

Home Page: You can see all projects Created on this page. You can save Photo & Video Projects here. 
Templates Page: You can see All Readymade designs & Templates here. Now you can search for any template you are looking for. 
Creation Page: By Tapping on “+” you can create Photo, Video, Collage and We have added Multiple quick tools, You can get all tool in Creation Page. 
Store: You can purchase all store material from this page. 
Profile: Signup for PICFY, Earn PICFY coins and Get all Store material redeeming PICFY Coins. 

We love to hear your feedback about this update. Please mail us at picfyhelp@gmail.com & our team will respond to you asap for any feedback. Follow us at picfy.app for new features updates.
